entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Vaults
entry.summary: In his latest post, Jeremy Rubin shares his expertise on building better cold storage for Bitcoin using Sapio. In a previous post, he emphasized the importance of self-custody and this post serves as a follow-up to demonstrate how Sapio in combination with CTV can enhance user experience. Rubin also apologizes for the overload of posts and promises to return to the inbox tomorrow. For more information, readers can visit https://rubin.io/bitcoin/2021/12/07/advent-10/.
